attributes.action: Investigate the costs and benefits of the envion plastic to oil converter with a view to invest in such a system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
News article available here:-

http://www.reuters.com/article/pressRelease/idUS74499+16-Sep-2009+PRN20090916

tl:dr version:

Environ have created a device that can turn a ton of plastic into 3-6 barrels of oil, depending on the type of plastic, at a rate of 10,000 tons of plastic per year per (scalable) machine.

The machine can use all types of plastic including previously landfilled plastics.
